title: Reactive REST with Quarkus made easy
content: Quarkus JAX RS implementation has improved a lot since its first release. Within this tutorial we will show some new features which are available in Quarkus starting from the new reactive REST paradigm. Quarkus uses SmallRye Mutiny for as main Reactive library. In our first tutorial, we have discussed how to use Mutiny to deliver ...  The post appeared first on .
